item.title: Explaining
item.description: Someone has asked a question (in Slack or Github) and you’re about to write an explanation. But before you start typing, ask yourself this: Is this the best place to answer this question? Because the place where the question is asked is generally not the best place to write a detailed answer. “Why did you do it that way?” Imagine you’ve requested a review on a Github pull request and one of the reviewers has questiond why something is done the way it is.
